pages.title: Magick Quadrant
pages.text: The magic quadrant is a special field, which can increase the magick of the same element within the range and weaken the magick of different elements within the range. Currently in nature, the Magick Quadrant will be unfolded by the Quadrant Crystal.

pages.title: Quadrant Crystal
pages.text: The Quadrant Crystal is the core part of the Magick Quadrant. If the Quadrant Crystal is killed, the Magick Quadrant will also disappear.

Quadrant Crystals are extraordinary magical beings, innately endowed with immense mana and the ability to manifest elemental attributes. $(br2)Their origins remain shrouded in mystery, as does their purpose within the world. $(br2)Often suspended in mid-air. They appear to be an integral part of the fabric of existence, possessing a direct connection to the flow of mana.

The Quadrant Crystal itself has a high-density elemental shield and will counterattack the attacker. During the day, they will release magick leaves to attack, and at night they will release star magick to attack, pursuing the efficiency of using magic. $(br2) Their attack magic will also be of the same element as themselves, and will be amplified by the magick quadrant, so try to keep a distance from them as much as possible. $(br2) Quadrant crystals will drop quadrant fragments after death, which can be synthesized with elemental crystals into radiance crystals.
